urls.title: Digitizing artwork to share Puerto Rican culture around the globe
urls.description: Today, for the first time, Puerto Rican art and culture is accessible on a new scale to audiences around the world. 10 museums and archives in Puerto Rico have come together through a partnership with Google Arts & Culture, Lin-Manuel Miranda and myself to launch Puerto Rico: The Sum of Its Arts. This new, digital exhibition is an immersive experience of Puerto Ricoâ€™s rich multicultural heritage through over 60 expert stories and exhibits, curated from over 1,100 artworks and artifacts by our partners.

data.text: 10 museums in Puerto Rico have come together through a partnership with @GoogleArts and @Lin_Manuel to bring over 1,000 pieces of artwork to the public for the first time. Now people around the world can see Puerto Rican masterpieces in our new exhibit. https://t.co/MYQ5UaHNWB
